a0.speaker: Sakuya:
a0.dialogue: Are you braindead!? Once bitten, twice shy.

a1.speaker: Sakuya:
a1.dialogue: Remember, you have been ambushed by that 'creepy kid' some time ago!

a2.speaker: Raiko:
a2.dialogue: What are you talking about? I have been cautious ever since I got ambushed, but I am here for another reason...

a4.speaker: Raiko:
a4.dialogue: About the mysterious ghoulish figure who was making me lose my business...

a5.speaker: Raiko:
a5.dialogue: I have sent my 'secret weapon' to negotiate with the 'mysterious person'. She shall return from the mission soon!
